title: Lone Wolf And Cub: 3 - Baby Cart To Hades

sources.title: Lone Wolf And Cub 3 Baby Cart To Hades
sources.description: Unfolding in an idyllic countryside that contrasts sharply with the violence that occurs within it, the third  Lone Wolf and Cub  film follows Itto Ogami and Daigoro as they continue their journey and stumble upon a crime scene involving a group of lowlife swordsmen from the watari-kashi class.
